#  Welcome to Our Visual Analytics Project

This is the official site for **Group 15**’s final project for *ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications* based on **VAST Challenge 2025 – Mini Challenge 1 (MC1)**.

Explore how Oceanus Folk spread across the music landscape and discover the next generation of stars with our visual analytics dashboard and supporting content.
